headline: The White House says Trump wants to close a favorite tax break of hedge fund managers
summary: The White House said the president wants to end a carried interest tax break prized by Wall Street hedge funds and private equity firms.

headline: Brookfield Plans Private Credit Sales Push and Ramps Up Hiring
